name: SlimeJump!
description:
Slime Jump! 

Jump your way to the top to turn back into a human! A game heavily inspired by Jump King, a platformer with mechanics that makes it more difficult than it should be, or so it seems.

  • This is a little bit different. You have 3 elements that the game will randomly choose.  Of which there are Fire, Electro, & Crystal. These 3 have special abilities that can help you throughout your journey... with a catch. There are platforms that also has elements. Although it doesn't do much, but if you have the wrong element, it might make the game a little bit harder.
  • Game controls?
  • Press A to go left
  • Press D to go right
  • Click spacebar for Jump (hold for long jump)

Made by 6 people. Please tell us what you think about the game ;)

this game is 100% free!
